description.value:
[Addictive] For 1d10+10 Minutes provides +20 to Strength and Toughness Characteristic, afterwards make +0 Toughness Test or suffer 1 Fatigue. Pass or Fail also suffer 1d5 Damage to random location that ignores Armour and Toughness.

Effect: Scarce

Notes: -
